channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- Modicon Quantum 140 NOE771x1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- Modicon Quantum 140 NOE771x1

item.title: CVE-2019-6811|2024-08-04T20:31:04.258Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- modicon%20quantum%20140%20noe771x1
item.description: An Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions (CWE-754) vulnerability exists in Modicon Quantum 140 NOE771x1 version 6.9 and earlier, which could cause denial of service when the module receives an IP fragmented packet with a length greater than 65535 bytes. The module then requires a power cycle to recover.
